title: Council Regulation (EEC) No 1976/85 of 16 July 1985 amending Regulation (EEC) No 2169/81 laying down the general rules for the system of aid for cotton
header:
COUNCIL  REGULATION (EEC) No 1976/85
of 16 July 1985
amending Regulation (EEC) No 2169/81 laying down the general rules for the system of aid for cotton
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: In the second subparagraph of Article 4 (1) and in the second subparagraph of Article 4 (4) of Regulation (EEC) No 2169/81, '1984/85' is hereby replaced by '1985/86'.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 16 July 1985.
For the Council
The President
M. FISCHBACH
(1) OJ No L 211, 31. 7. 1981, p. 2.
(2) OJ No L 142, 29. 5. 1984, p. 1.
